place_description: Come unplug, relax, and experience a cup of serenity at the Pauline Tea-Bar Apothecary! Sip or purchase an herbal tea, spend time in contemplative solace, or experience creative play with a friend or group! Also register for one of our holistic classes and gain greater clarity or nourishment for your soul!

reviews_data.review_text: Seriously wonderful place. It doesn't feel ordering at a typical cafe, it feels like being served as a guest at someone's house. The staff is so kind and friendly, and theres a wide selection of teas to choose from. Everything they brought out was SO dainty and cute! There were tiny spoons and forks for your pastries and tiny tea pots! I loved it so much!! I won't spoil anything else in this review, you just gotta visit for yourself, you will NOT regret it!!!
amazing atmosphere ! They staff were welcoming. The space has tables and comfortable couches. Great for reading or getting some work done. Not completely quiet but work friendly:)
Lovely environment to sit and sip tea.  Great service, wonderful hostess, and very enjoyable background music.

When you 1st walk in, you'll smell the amazing fresh and calming aroma in the air. The decorations are also very cute and calming. I could sit there and chill out for hours. When you order a tea, you will get to choose a cute cup from the wall for your drink. The owner is very nice and she makes you feel very comfortable in her establishment.

From out of town,, first time visit.  This place is very cozy and quaint.  The service was pleasant and courteous, very patient and helpful in explaining everything about the process.  We sat and enjoyed the smooth and relaxing ambiance of the room.  The tea was top quality and savory. We met the owner and gave our very positive feedback.  We will definitely return.  Go check them out.

My brother and sister-in-law treated me to some pots of tea. This was a spur of the moment find. And what a great place. The atmosphere and staff are both wonderful. We had green raspberry and turmeric tea. Highly recommend experience!

This place is absolutely amazing. The concept of unplugging and being in the moment is wonderful. The teas are delicious. When you step into this place, you are immediately at peace. I absolutely love how the owner is supporting the community. Please support this business. You will absolutely love this place!
This place is so wonderful. Went there for the first time yesterday and can't recommend here. Such a cosy atmosphere and a fantastic selection of teas.

My son took me here because of my love for teas. I was visiting him from New Jersey. So enjoyable I had to lemon ginger sooo good.
Mention she just open another location and has Jazz on Fridays at this location.
Thanky you
Great atmosphere. Great service. Great tea!

the mist spectacular place I've ever had the opportunity to visit and the atmosphere is perfect for unwinding and relaxing every part of your body and mind!!  I will bring my en to ire family to enjoy the experience here!!
Quaint and friendly. Very relaxing.
So cute and dainty!!  Enjoyed the oolong tea.

Great atmosphere.   This is a place where there is no WiFi as it is meant to be a place to unplug and relax.  I actually first came across Pauline when they used to serve tea at the VAPA (Visual and Performing Arts) center in Charlotte.  Been a big fan ever since.

Such a peaceful location to unwind. Loved the various tea selections AND that you can pick out a tea cup that "speaks" to you and your personality. When I go back to Charlotte, I will definitely stop by again (maybe even check out their 2nd location off of Beatties Ford that is scheduled to open in 2024)
Beautiful little spot with character, unique touches of love , and of course incredible tea

I can't remember the last time I looked forward to submitting a review this much. I've been meaning to stop by for a while, but there's always a conflict with my work schedule. I finally made it yesterday, Saturday  12-23-23.

The vibe was serene the moment I stepped inside. I'm not sure what I smelled as I was getting ready to order, but I thought for sure I smelled a hint of ginger. The young lady who took my order was pleasant and eager to answer my questions being a first timer. The menu is extensive, especially if you love tea. I liked that there was also a description of both the tea ingredients and how it benefits you. The other lady (assumed it was the owner) was just as pleasant.

I ordered lemon ginger tea and macaroons. Both were delicious as I sipped and took bites while writing in my journal. I was on my way to visit nursing home residents and spread some holiday cheer. This was a perfect way to get in a little self care.

I couldn't stay as long as I wanted to. If it were up to me, I'd have stayed until they closed at 4 pm. They'll be closed from December 24 - January 1, so I know it was God's will for me to go & have this experience to end 2023. As if I couldn't be wooed any more, I stumbled across the prayer room as I was leaving. I can't wait to return in 2024! I anticipate it being one of my tranquility Saturday spots in the new year.
Beautiful place! It was so inviting and the tea was delicious. The owner was kind and helpful. Definitely coming back!
I love this place! It's so cozy.
My first visit and I absolutely love this place. The atmosphere is relaxing and the music is lovely. I will return again and again.  Thank you for allowing me to feel welcome. K
Absolutely lovely spot for great tea and meeting a few friends or having a quiet moment. Service, drinks, and space are all exquisite. Go try it!
The atmosphere was calm and zenful.

This is one of the most wholesome and rejuvenating places in the greater Charlotte area. I bring all my friends and family here for any (and every) occasion. Especially as someone who feels sad during the winter, there's nothing like a warm cup of tea in a gorgeous and cozy cafe to lift my spirits.
This was such an amazing experience. The atmosphere was so calming and welcoming. Everyone was so kind and helpful. We will definitely be coming back!!!

I love this atmosphere of this place, delicious tea and a beautiful event... Come support this black owned business where ur free to just relax with no judgement in a peaceful environment

i am going back here to write
its def inspiring to be in the space <3
Great place for small group meet-ups!
Love it here

An incredibly welcoming and relaxing space. The tea selections are vast and the service, impeccable! There's even a prayer closet! The owner is wonderful, knowledgeable and helpful in selecting the best teas for your visit. I picked a tea cup that "spoke" to me and found a nice place to rest. I can't wait to return as this place is just what I need to take a short break from all the stresses of life.
A lovely and wonderful place. If you like tea you must visit!
Every inch of the space is well thought out and the service matches that. I had a perfectly made pot of chai with oat milk.

I learned of this place from a guy on social media. I was excited to try it because my daughter and I love tea and keep an entire cabinet dedicated to tea in the home so I took her and a friend. This place is so cute, so cozy and relaxing. The staff was so friendly and and learned  our names quickly. We purchased 3 bakery items and 3 pots of tea and loved it all. The teenagers loved it. The review is long over due and we said this would be our new hangout on weekends but life has been lifing and have not been but once so we will go again next weekend. Either way, such a cute, relaxing place with a great selection of teas that is definitely worth a visit.

This place is so beautiful and amazing! The atmosphere is relaxing and peaceful. Aesthetically pleasing. Comfortable. The staff are very sweet. The tea was delicious. This is my new favorite place in Charlotte.
Wonderful environment with such energizing tea served with warm smiles and beautiful music. Cannot wait to return!

This is my new favorite place to go. The vibe is so laid back and calm. Ms. Sherry and her daughter are such beautiful people. I stop in any chance that I get. I recently went to the Mother's Day High Tea event which I really enjoyed. The tea and treats were really tasty. I look forward to attending more of their events moving forward. I also now own about 7 different teas from them that I rotate. I am currently enjoying a cup of their Lemon Ginger blend. ... SO GOOD.
It is a cute location. Very whimsical. The herbalist helps you select a tea and pair it with a sweet.

This is a tea lover's sanctuary. I got a tea recommendation from the herbalist to help with my headache and paired with a delicious cookie. You choose the perfect mug for yourself from an eclectic selection near the teas. I met a customer while waiting that said she visits daily and picks the same mug. The space is inviting, soothing, and relaxing with a variety of sitting areas and calm music. The owner is very friendly and hospitable.
Such a serene environment. We were able to have a relaxed meeting and enjoy each other's company and the moment. Looking forward to going back and bringing others.

Lovely ladies who served my friend and me a chai tea in a cute little frog teapot.
It was packed ! Very calming atmosphere with so much love and positivity oozing from every corner.
We did have to wait a little while but it wasn't so bad with such a lovely atmosphere.
A warm and welcoming environment with a fabulous selection of teas. We really enjoyed our afternoon break here. Highly recommend!
So quaint. Beautiful energy. Just so lovely! Please come and support this Black, Woman, and faith-led establishment! Continued success to you!
Been wanting to get here + I finally did!!! So cute + cozy. Lots of parking. Easily accessible, friendly staff + great tea options!!!
Comfort,tranquil and thoughtful energy
Staff is always friendly and the presentation   very lovely! My fav tea spot!
Simply divine. Great tea. Cozy atmosphere. Great place to bring a book or crochet/knitting and bask in the amazingness. Danielle is simply wonderful
Went for my sister's birthday and for the First Friday concert, thoroughly enjoyed it!  Love the atmosphere and the staff. Will be going back to purchase tea.

I chose this place without knowing what it was truly about because I was looking for a place to be with myself that wasn't surrounded by alcohol or caffeine. Not only is it adorable but the mission of self-love and adventure was vibrating from the thoughtfully curated spaces and tea cups. The amount of love poured into this place is profound and something to be celebrated and supported. I will be back and will recommend to any and everybody. Thank you for sharing this sanctuary with us.
A must stop for Charlotte. The establishment gives you a feeling similar to a warm, cozy house and the tea was bold yet soothing. Highly recommend!

Fantastic and special place. The space is peaceful and welcoming. Friendly and knowledgeable staff. It's a delight to choose one of the mugs and the tea and food are delicious. There is a nice variety of teas and treats. I wish I lived in Charlotte -- I'd be here all the time! But next time in town I will stop in again. I'm grateful to have spent a few lovely hours here on a rainy afternoon.

Very cozy and unique tea bar.  Comfortable  sitting to allow for chat or there are individual chairs and outside seating.  Prayer room is offered. Teas are very aromatic.  Tea desserts are available  for purchase.   Shop also highlights local artists

Lovely place with delicious teas and the sweetest people. During our time there, It was clear that this place is like an oasis for the community. The staff was friendly and attentive to everyone who stepped through the door. I had the cranberry orange tea and a blueberry muffin. And even grabbed a few loose teas to enjoy at home. Will definitely be returning!
The spot to have intimate conversations in Charlotte! Black and Lovely!

Went here for the first time today. And wow, what a great experience!  I came in for a holiday gift and stayed for some tea myself. Very cozy and inviting atmosphere. The shop also offers bites to eat, plenty of books, and beautiful art. Will definitely be back!

I can't even say this is Charlotte's best kept secret because more and more people are learning about Pauline's everyday! Lol! I learned forever ago that if you find a good things - share it with everyone. I personally LOVE everything about Paulines - Sherry, Ilona, and Danielle are such sweethearts. They treat everyone like a superstar and who doesn't need that in life? <3 If you're looking for a nurturing environment to read, relax, unplug, work or connect with friends - this is where you need to be.
The ginger-tumeric was so good that I order it and have it shipped to my hometown.
Peaceful environment. The tea was delicious and service was wonderful. If you are carrying stress, I also recommend making the time and space to walk the labyrinth outside.
Chill vibes. Can't wait to return!
An AWESOME place to sip on some tea read a book or meditation
The best!!!!
Nice atmosphere, the herbalist recommended tea options and will definitely return

Today was my first time visiting this tea-bar and I had the most amazing experience! Sherry and her daughter welcomed us with a warm smile and served us tea and sweet treats. We really enjoyed sitting here, talking, and in the prayers closet. We will definitely be back!

With a warm welcome, we walked into this sweet tea bar and were guided to pick a tea and then pick our own tea cup from the wall of choices. Very reasonably priced, delicious, and cute! The people who work here are very friendly. We enjoyed our afternoon stop here!
An awesome experience each visit, especially today. The wonderful sounds of live music along with the informative and interactive Holistic Wellness Fair made today a great day!
This place was so great! The staff were so warm and welcoming, and made us felt special and right at home! Great tea and service!
Friendly atmosphere!
Relaxing atmosphere. Wonderful tea selection. It's my go to place to meet for work and  friends.
Cute little tea house. Very chill atmosphere and the tea is really good. The woman who helped us was very friendly and it was nice getting to chat with her. A very nice local business.
Please take the time to stop in this amazing an unique tea place. Enjoy conversations with friends, get sweet bites and enjoy the different arts events.
Always a joy to spend time here.  Sherry and her employees are warm and welcoming, knowledgeable and fun.
Great tea! Caring and personable staff! Delicious gluten free banana bread! Nomnomnom!

What a delightful place! Full of beauty and love. They have artwork, games, sand box, cozy places to sit, and just great people. And you get to choose your own tea and your own cup! I was pleasantly surprised as I felt I was back in England.
You could not ask for a more warm and welcoming spot to sit and drink a cup of tea.

I thoroughly enjoyed the energy of the apothecary and the spirit of the owner and the lovely attendee. I came to share with a special occasion,  then returned to share with my author to suggest as a meeting place for her book launch. She agreed it's exactly the right vibe. I will be returning to just 'bask' and enjoy my cup of tea and a moment of peace while playing in the zen garden, tabletop sand box.

Thank you for sharing your special place.

I am visiting the Queen City so I came here for tea. Sherry, the owner is a very sweet and engaging lady. The ambience is inviting, peaceful and relaxing. This is the perfect spot for a great cup of tea. I'm looking forward to my next visit.
This location was very inviting.
Wonderful
Very Relaxing atmosphere. Add in the knowledgeable staff and this place is a midday sanctuary.  It's a must stop any time I'm in the area. Love it!
Love this place. Amazing and relaxing. The live band was great on first Friday.
I found this spot on google.  I met up with a friend, and we both instantly loved it.  Great atmosphere, great service, it's now one of my favorite places to relax!
Very sweet local business. Excellent selection of teas and such kind staff. Very relaxing vibe.
Love this place! Still great!

Such a charming space inside and out. On-site herbalist was very helpful and guided us to a wonderful choice!

It's special to be able to choose your own teacup from the beautiful collection they have!

Great parking and easy to get to and find!

Pleasant patio spaces!
This place is such a little jewel. The atmosphere is so relaxing and the tea was so yummy. We will be back. Now open for events and live music.

I highly recommend this place for tea enthusiasts or anyone new to tea! Unique, the best tea selection in town, a soothing environment to recharge or unwind, and plenty of comfortable seating. Every detail is thoughtful, including the beautiful teapots and teacups. This is a special experience. I can't wait to go back!
Quality teas and people. This is the only tea centered place in clt. Super happy to have met Sherry and her daughter.

The minute I walked into this amazing tea bar my heart felt at home!!! This tranquil oasis is a tea lover's DREAM! From the ambiance... the stellar service... vast tea selections.. to the meditation room.. you will never want to leave!! This is a true gem in the Queen City!
Absolutely amazing, sweetest host and great tea!
The best vibes around!! The owner is so sweet and kind, a beautiful spot for the community.

I kept driving by this place and got curious. I'm so glad I went in! The whole vibe is like being at your aunt's house with comfy floral couches and hand crocheted blankets. The tea was delicious and the blueberry scone I got was out of this world. It's such a comfortable and calm atmosphere. I recently got sober too so it's nice to have a place to go and not be tempted. I can't wait to come back. Thank you to the staff for being awesome.
Therapeutic, cozy, clean and awesome tea!
Cute local find! Chill atmosphere & great place for self care.
Beautiful, relaxing, incredibly cute place. The tea cups and pots are beautiful. The atmosphere is warm, inviting, and smells great. I loved the Indian Spice tea!
Very cute tea place. The owner was very nice and welcoming and we got to pick out our own teacup sets!
I really enjoyed my time here with my friend. It's a very peaceful place. I left with some tea and I was very relaxed. Thank you from my soul

This place is magical, the innerG here is amazing! The location and ambiance is amazing. It's so quaint and cozy. I had the Turmeric Ginger Tea w/Golden Milk, and I loved that I got to pick my own mug out of the wall of mugs. My date and I played a "get to know you" card game and also checked out the book collection. My most favorite detail is the prayer room! The idea of such a sacred space to compliment such a well intentioned space! If you love tea and good innerG this is your spot!!! It just may be a the house of love and healing!
Great place

I recently had the opportunity to visit this super cute spot as part of a promotional event.  If you are a tea fan, you definitely want to find time to go here. The decor is warm and inviting, and makes you want to stay awhile. The tea and snacks were very good.

Although I arrived close to closing, I definitely plan to return again soon to get the full experience.

This is a wonderful space and! I'm glad Charlotte has it it. I immediately felt welcomed walking in here. Background muisc was just right. I love  the  different types of decor and of seating available. The art throught the space is all local too- love the community support. All the beagizil teacups and teapots ! They infused sugar cubes which I will have to come back and try for sure. There also so nakery items and chips to pair with your tea. You can do a cup or a pot of tea. This is the original location; a second location just opened definitely will try and visit.

The 1st Friday of the month there is live music so I'll have to check out th calendar for 2022.

Out goodie bags came with samples but I also bought a tea tin- comes with 1oz of your tea of choice.

Very pleasant experience after a long day at work.

Anytime is tea time in my book ! This place is so cute & right  up my alley . This place is a whole vibe , & in my case a whole vibe outside . I opted to sit outside on the cute patio set since it's a nice day. They were very informative about explaining the different teas & what they were good for . I chose the flower power tea .

I had the whole experience with the ceramic tea set and instead of crumpets & pastries I had some sort of sweet potato bread that was insanely good . Something so small packed a lot of flavor & punch . Do note it's  a small prayers room that I absolutely love . I'll definitely be visiting this tea bar often .

This is a great place to meet old friends and new. Sherry provides a sacred and calm place for all people to enjoy.  I have never been a tea drinker, but she sold me.  I am there every Saturday because of the customer service and conversation. The mood is on chill and the atmosphere is welcoming.

I saw a post from a group that tried to host a party and take over the spot. I was there, they were so wrong and did not understand the assignment.

Sherry you keep doing what you do.  Selah and Amen.

This very small YET COMFORTING environment I would never recommend for a party bc it's not a venue that fits more than 20 maximum. And if you checked them out first. Your experience would have let you known that this is a mediation place and not a party joint. I'm a peace seeker and HAVE FOUND THAT AT Pauline's. So if you're loud boisterous or obnoxious then you need to be partying in a club. And the negative reviews reflect exactly why this didn't go well for you. So please don't recommend any of your friends or family that have those attitude and unfortunately it's a lot of us Black women that do this. STOP IT.
GIVE PAULINE'S TEA APOTHECARY A TRY. I WILL FOR AT LEAST ONCE A WEEK. For  as long as I drink teaTHE TEAS ARE AWESOME. IF YOU KNOW TEAS. THEN YOU KNOW. IF you don't then you'll think not.
LET US SIP TO PEACE LOVE AND LIGHT

EMPRYSS AND I WILL SEE YOU SOON
BLESSINGS
Nadyne

My first experience here was terrible. I did not feel welcome, nor did my party. The woman who spoke to us was very condescending. She made us feel as though we were "less than", which came as a shock since we were trying to support a black owned business. It may be black owned but it felt like "white only" was preferred.  I'm not a tea connoisseur, but of all the teas I sampled not one was good. They also took 20 minutes to bring a bottle a water and we had to repeatedly ask them to restock the sugar. I definitely would not recommend this establishment.

Came in today for my sisters birthday party which was a small gathering. The owner was very condescending and made us feel like we didn't belong there. I really wanted to support a black owned business but WILL NOT BE BACK TO THIS LOCATION.
Would not recommend, came in for a tea party today and did not feel welcome. So disappointed in the service we experience today.
Sherry and her daughter go out of their way to create a relaxed atmosphere to enjoy the full experience. He knowledge of tea and compliments are extensive. A bucket list stop for Charlotte
Great spot!
Great space to UNPlug

I love this place. It's so serene, joyful & peaceful! Took a yoga class there one Saturday two weeks ago which was my first time there. I applaud Sherry, the owner of Pauline's & her daughter for providing such a wonderful tea bar & beautiful space outside of home for that calming cup of tea & other relaxing activities! Much success to you & many Blessings!
Ambience is really great and staffs are really welcoming. Best place to spend the time if want to wait for the flight. It's near by airport. Also great for working/ Hangout spot.
Great atmosphere

This is a very nice, intermit place to sit, have a cup of herbal tea, and a muffin. The evening we went there was live entertainment. This venue is very cozy. The owner and the staff makes you feel like you are visiting someone's home and not a business.
Great atmosphere. The owner was very sweet and welcoming.

I had a wonderful experience here. The atmosphere was pure calm and relaxation. I was greeted and walked through tea and snack selections so warmly by the owner and her daughter. We sat outside in the breeze where our trays were brought to us while we sipped and laughed for hours. We literally lost track of time and just enjoyed ourselves. I'll definitely be back and would highly recommend.

I hosted my graduation party of 30-50 people  we brought food and drinks  and more than enough space for everyone to socialize and enjoy the evening. The decor was wonderfully placed and the owner was very accommodating she let me play my own music and took pictures for a affordable rate. She kept an ear for any help we needed. Can't wait to host my next event

By far the best tea bar I've been to! The inside is so warm and inviting. It has the most perfect sanctuary feel! It was much bigger inside than I anticipated as well. So many cute areas to sit and relax. The owner Sherry is delightful!! She'll help you with any tea selection you need. I'm so glad we have this place in our neighborhood! I can't wait to visit again!
Such a tranquil and relaxing ambiance! From the Doterra essential oil aroma in the air to the peaceful intimate spaces, this is the perfect spot for tea time!

Great place to catch up with a friend who you haven't seen due to being in quarantine for a year.
The Tea  bar environment was very clean and welcoming.  The Tea Bar has a large variety of tea and unique tea cups to choose from.  Also for your viewing pleasure Artwork adorn the walls of tea bar.
Very nice place. Peaceful, clean and the staff is kind and attentive.
Nice place to go and relax anytime. Especial first Friday entertainment

Today was my first visit and it was amazing.  The welcoming atmosphere and spirits of Sherry and her daughter makes you want to come everyday.  If you want amazing, tea, good sweet treats and serenity,  please come.

Friendly, zen atmosphere, and most importantly large selection of tea and tea beverages! I am able to bring in my own containers to stock up on loose leaf tea to enjoy at home. I love this place. I haven't found any place like it!
Such a beautiful environment and atmosphere
Probably one of the most unique places in Charlotte. Highly recommend if you need a place to relax and just read a book
Great place to unwind, relax and have tea
Beautiful atmosphere and loose tea selection.  Owner is friendly and very knowledgeable.  Indoor and Outdoor seating is available.
Caught live music from some very talented students along with tasty tea !!
Stumbled into here on accident. What an amazing place! This atmosphere coupled with the wonderful owner, her extensive knowledge on teas, you absolutely have to visit!
Amazing vibe.... energy was great. Outdoor patio and live jazz first Friday.

It's a really nice tea shop and the owner was very helpful. They followed social distancing protocol and I felt very comfortable buying my tea from there. I bought some Lemon Ginger, white tea and spicy crimson tea. I can't wait to try them all! Post-pandemic, I can't wait to just hang out and chill. In the picture is the lemon ginger tea. Smells like heaven!
Great service and great atmosphere!  Can't wait to go back!
Beautiful and relaxing space! The tea is fantastic! Mrs. Sherry is super sweet and the place is just lovely and cozy. Will be coming here weekly now!
So Awesome Visiting Here Today!!! Delicious Tea and Serene Atmosphere! A Perfect Place to Relax and Unwind!!! A "Must Visit" Spot in Charlotte!!!
Beautiful and serene space and delicious tea!  They are open indoors and have tables outdoors, too!
Wonderful relaxing space! Beautiful showcase of artist work as well. Love the pergola addition!

I recently had my bridal shower at the tea bar and it was amazing! Sherry was very attentive to making sure our group was okay and the tea was wonderful! All of my guest love the tea and love the atmosphere! I definitely recommend this place for a bridal shower or any other event.
Absolutely loved this Tea-Bar. It's so inviting and serene and the teas were so good.
Love this place very serene
Great place to unwind
Such a great atmosphere and even better owner! This is a gem in Charlotte.
What a perfect place!
My absolute favorite new place!!! Ever felt like you were in a spa where you are soaking in the atmosphere and drinking yummy tea! Head over there its amazing.
Fantastic vibe, beautiful decor, and the best perfectly-steeped jasmine green tea I've ever had.

This place is an experience. Sherry Waters, the owner and hostess barista and master of ceremonies, is a local treasure who has collaborated with family and community to open this hearth space.

Natural light and greenery abounds here. If you dont have a book, there are plenty here to raise your vibe and the clientele is lively and warm. There are also nooks to be to yourself.

Oh! And these are great loose leaf teas; I usually have what Sherry is having because she has a way with using teas to bring balance. There are often tasty vegan and gluten free options for the baked choices and a couple of dairy free milks (SCORE!).
Beautiful experience, what my soul needed.
Picked up granddaughter from a birthday party

Relaxing, rejuvenating, and welcoming! Everytime I step through the doors there's a weight lifted off my shoulders. This isn't just a tea bar and apothecary - it's an experience. For anyone looking for a nice retreat for the soul, look no further.
What a wonderfully unexpected delight! The Pauline Tea-Bar Apothecary is a mindful oasis in a swirling desert of purposeless busyness.
Great atmosphere for hosting small business meetings
Great atmosphere!

When you walk in, you can literally feel the calm energy followed by the rich aroma of teas.  The place was very clean and crisp. The owner was so pleasant and accommodating. I will continue bringing clients here. They also have open mic nights!
So relaxing,peaceful and so many different tea's. Most definitely will be back with friends and family.
Wonderful, peaceful place to unplug, unwind and connect
This space is so peaceful. The owners are so welcoming. The tea is just divine.
What a lovely, peaceful spot. Go here when you need to unplug and just be (no wifi). Excellent selection of herbal teas and locally made treats. The owner is gracious and accommodating.

Best place to fire up a conversation! I'm here at least weekly to reflect on life. Good owners, down to earth, with big hearts. I like how they support local artists. Really awesome, relaxing place. The tea is outstanding.
Very relaxing. Great atmosphere.
Extremely relaxing and refreshing - great place to enjoy some herbal tea and have meetings, too.
